text: Today @seiu_uhw we kick off Phonebanking to oppose the #CARecall In the 3rd surge we need @CAgovernor @GavinNewsom to continue to stand with #HealthcareHeroes we need to extend #CovidSickLeave law which expires 9/30 . We still need to protect the most vulnerable #VoteNoOnRecall https://t.co/UoH7yOqtrE
